definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ex 12:13 blow, striking (as judgment, only P);—´[[נ]] abs. Ex 12:13 + 6 t.;—
fatal blow, plague, Ex 12:13 (death of first-born); Ex 30:12, Nu 8:19 (indef.); = pestilence Nu 17:11, Nu 17:12, Jos 22:17.
striking, ´[[אֶבֶן נ]] Is 8:14 i.e. against which the foot strikes and so stumbles (‖[[חוּר מִכְשׁוֹל]]).
